data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Hi. I don't know if I'm going about this the right way. I wrote a
    simple module to read BDF (bitmap distribution format) font files.

    The module is very simple, nothing noteworthy, written because I
    could not find anything already in existence to do it. It provides a
    base for anyone who wants to do anything with these files, however.

    This module only reads BDF files, no writing, nor
    manipulation/conversion of font data.

    Thanks!
